general.gigTitle: do website development, build custom website design as full stack web developer

sellerCard.oneLiner: Full Stack Website Developer I Expert in Frontend, Backend Development
sellerCard.description:
Greetings to all aspiring brands and visionaries!

I'm Parvej Miah, a skilled Full Stack Website Developer specializing in creating custom-tailored, functional websites designed to meet the unique needs of businesses and individuals.

My development process includes: 

i) Planning and Research
ii) UI/UX Design
iii) Frontend Development
iv) Backend Development
v) API Integration
vi) Testing & Debugging
vii) Deployment
viii) Post-Launch Support

Ready to level up your web presence? Hit the Contact Me button for a free consultation, and let's create something amazing together!

description.content:
Thank you for visiting my Custom Website Development GIG! I'm Parvej Miah, an experienced Full-stack Web Developer passionate about helping individuals and businesses succeed online.


I'm excited to announce that I've earned the CERTIFIED badge in full stack website development and successfully developed over 500 websites for clients around the globe.


Whether you need a fully functional site built from scratch or redesign an existing site, I'm here to deliver exceptional, customized solutions that meet your unique requirements.


Technologies I Use to Build a Website:


  • Frontend: HTML/CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Vue.js
  • Backend: Node.js, Express.js, PHP, Laravel, TypeScript
  • Databases: MySQL, MongoDB, PostgreSQL


Services I Offer:


  • Custom Website Development
  • Frontend Development
  • Backend Development
  • Responsive Design for All Devices
  • API Integration
  • eCommerce Functionality
  • SEO + Speed Optimization
  • Payment Gateway Setup
  • Social Media Integration


Why ORDER Me?


  • CERTIFIED Web Developer
  • Quality Work & On-time Delivery
  • 24/7 Communication
  • Post-delivery Support


Let's join forces to elevate your business to new heights. I'm open to offers & eager to help you achieve remarkable success.

slide.name: do website development, build custom website design as full stack web developer

questionsAndAnswers.question: What information do you need from me to start building my custom website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I'll need details about your project requirements and your full cooperation to ensure we achieve the best possible results for you.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will all pages be responsive and mobile-friendly?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, all the pages are super responsive, mobile-friendly, and support all devices and browsers.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you provide ongoing support for website maintenance after development?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! I provide ongoing support and maintenance services to ensure your website stays up-to-date and performs at its best.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What do you need from me for the Figma to Website conversion?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Just share your Figma design files and any specific requirements, and I’ll handle the rest!

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you provide source code?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, I provide the complete source code for your website. You’ll receive all the files and code necessary for full access and future modifications.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Can you help with branding and logo design?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: While my primary focus is on website development, I can collaborate with designers to help with branding and logo design.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you ensure the security of my website?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I ensure the security of your website by implementing best practices, including SSL certificates, secure coding techniques, etc.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I request revisions?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: I provide a set number of revisions based on your package. You can request changes through the platform's messaging system.

packageList.title: Home or Landing Page Development
packageList.description: Build or Rebuild the Home/Landing Page/One Page of a Basic Responsive Website + Basic SEO

packageList.title: 5 Pages Custom Website Development
packageList.description: 5 Pages of Responsive Custom Website + Ecommerce Functionality + Basic SEO + Ongoing Support

packageList.description: 10 Pages of Responsive Custom Website + Ecommerce Functionality + Basic SEO + Ongoing Support
